front.title: Network Virtualization Hypervisor-to-NVE Overlay Control Protocol Requirements

abstract.t: The document "Problem Statement: Overlays for Network Virtualization" discusses the needs for network virtualization using overlay networks in highly virtualized data centers. The problem statement outlines a need for control protocols to facilitate running these overlay networks. This document outlines the high level requirements related to the interaction between hypervisors and the Network Virtualization Edge device when the two entities are not co-located on the same physical device.
